"now that your with us, understand that we don't fight Maximals, we only fi=
ght Alliance and sometimes the Predacons, we're in this to end this war....=
" Dracona pointed out.. "i'm Dracona, that's Plintissa, she's talking to th=
e core consiousness of Suukie, and those are the Radicons, Stranato, Arrow,=
 Stronghold, Airbomber, Scamrock, and Train Wreck...." Dracona pointed out.=
...The Radicons stopped strangling each other and waved to Wrath and Kamodi=
a......
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwr=
pg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 6:27 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Be=
ast Wars


  *Wrath Kamodia payed very much attention to everything Dracona=
 showed them*
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: =
nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 6:21 PM
    Subject: Re=
: Neo Beast Wars


    Dracona smiled... "great, we needed members..the rad=
icons looked at each other angily....with one punch Scamrock knocked down A=
rrow, but dracona stopped the fight quickly......Dracona pointed out the se=
crets of the base to Wrath and Kamodia, like the secret passagewaay and stu=
ff.....
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
  =
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 6:15 PM
     =
 Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      *Wrath and Kamodia begin walking aroun=
d looking at all the CR Chamber's and Computer's* Kamodia: Well, I seem to =
like it. Wrath: It didn't take us too long to get in here. *They both turne=
d to Dracona* Kamodia: I wish to join. Wrath: Count me in for that.
       =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@eg=
roups.com 
        Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 5:30 PM
        Subject: Re:=
 Neo Beast Wars


        "yes, you can join us, the People's Group!..." Dr=
acona said..... "come on, we'll show you, but promise not to ever let this =
slip out......" Dracona said.....Dracona put a blindfold on Wrath and Kamod=
ia and (with Orchid's permission only, if Orchid doesn't like this then it =
doesn't have to happen, just wanted to quicken things...) took them through=
 the secret passageway..... "thiss is the base....it's all underground...."=
 Dracona said, removing the blindfolds from Wrath and Kamodia.....
        =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: ilovealllizards 
          =
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 3:36 AM
     =
     Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          *Wrath and Kamodia turned to l=
ook* Wrath: Do you know where we can get a job? *Wrath asked to Dracona* *W=
rath said as he and Kamodia walked up to Dracona* *Kamodia smiled as she go=
t her wish of meeting some more bots*
            ----- Original Message --=
--- 
            From: THECODE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
       =
     Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 3:24 AM
            Subject: Re: Neo Beast=
 Wars


            Dracona and company finishe repairing all except for su=
ukie, wgo was injured too bad and would take a long time to repair..Plintis=
sa, much to Dracona's anger, had forgotten about their mission and stayed t=
o talk to Suukie....the Radicons and Dracona came from the secret passage w=
ay when nobody could possibly see, and walked off searching for some member=
s......the Radicons bickered among themselves and Dracona studied the lands=
cape..Dracona saw Wrath and Kamodia.. "hey, you 2, over here!..." Dracona s=
aid, calling out Wrath and Kamodia......the Radicons drew their blasters an=
d stood guard, Scamrock laughed and played with his thumbs......Dracona sho=
wed her hands empty to show that she came in peace....she waved to Wrath an=
d Kamodia.....
              ----- Original Message ----- 
              Fr=
om: ilovealllizards 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Se=
nt: Monday, May 29, 2000 9:12 PM
              Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
=


              *Kamodia thought she saw something for a minute but figures=
 its all in her mond continues walking on*
                ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
                From: THECODE 
                To: nbwrpg@egr=
oups.com 
                Sent: Monday, May 29, 2000 6:43 AM
              =
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                Plintissa looks in the dist=
ance and spots Wrath and Kamodia....Plintissa knows the would be good for t=
he People's Group, but no wway she could invite them with these idiot Truth=
s surrounding her!......she ushers to Wrath and Kamodia, hoping they'll see=
......
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
                  Fr=
om: ilovealllizards 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            =
      Sent: Monday, May 29, 2000 2:15 AM
                  Subject: Neo Bea=
st Wars


                  *Wrath and Kamodia still stand on the outside o=
f the Maximal base* Wrath: HEEEEYYYY!! WE WANT A JOB!!! *Wrath yells at the=
 top of his lungs* *Than he notices Kamodia walking away* Wrath: Where are =
you going? Kamodia: I'm not sticking around here when they don't want us. W=
rath: How do you know that they don't? Kamodia: If they really wanted us th=
an they'd answer us. *Kamodia turns and walks on looking for another base* =
*Wrath stands there thinking about what Komodia said and comes to the fact =
that she's right* Wrath: Hey wait up! *Wrath comes running up and catches u=
p with Kamodia* Kamodia: What made you leave? *She says giving off a sly gr=
in* Wrath: I came to the fact that I'm too good for that dump. Kamodia: Com=
e on, admit it! I'm right. If they really wanted us then they would've answ=
ered us. *Wrath doesn't answer and keeps looking foward* Kamodia: Your just=
 mad because you know I'm right but you are right about that place being a =
dump. *They contiue walking on*
